name: Brian

projects.title: C Compiler

services.title: Full-Stack Web Development
services.description: I specialize in building scalable, user-centric web applications using modern frameworks like Next.js, Django and Spring, ensuring seamless performance and engaging user experiences.

services.title: CI/CD & Cloud Infrastructure
services.description: I design and implement robust cloud solutions using AWS services such as S3, EC2, and Lambda, enabling secure, efficient, and scalable infrastructure

services.title: Authentication & Security
services.description: I implement secure authentication systems using OAuth, NextAuth, and JWTs, ensuring a seamless and safe login experience for users.

services.title: 3D Web Experiences
services.description: I create interactive 3D visuals and animations with Three.js, enhancing user engagement.

aboutpara: I am a results-driven software engineer with expertise in TypeScript, Next.js, and AWS, specializing in building scalable web applications. In my latest project, Moophoria, I implemented features like audio recording, OAuth authentication, and AWS S3 integration, enhancing user engagement.  With a Computer Science degree from the University of Waterloo, I am expanding my skills in Java (Spring) and 3D web development (Three.js) to tackle future challenges. I thrive in collaborative environments, driving technical innovation and delivering impactful solutions.

education.universityPara: I graduated with a Bachelor of Computer Science degree from the University of Waterloo. I was on the Dean's Honours List and graduated with distinction.
